doc.field: - Montreal Trustco Inc is issuing a 100 mln Canadian dlr, 8-1/2 pct bond due May 6, 1992 at 101 pct, lead manager Societe Generale said. The non-callable issue is of unsecured, unsubordinated debt. Denominations are of 1,000 and 10,000 Canadian dlrs and listing is in Luxembourg. Payment date is May 5. Fees are 1-1/4 pct for selling, 3/8 pct for underwriting and 1/4 pct for management including a 1/8 pct praecipuum.
